hackathon-description-text: We're hosting the third installment of our Student Hackathon in the University of Sheffield, open to students across the country! We provide the WiFi, power, and food while teams of hackers create something new and exciting.
hackathon-eligibility: Team of 1-4 people. Must be at university, or have graduated since 14th October 2016.
hackathon-rules: We use the MLH Code of Conduct:

hackathon-prizes.prize-title: Best IoT Hack Using a Qualcomm Device
Amazon Web Services - Best Use of AWS
Change Banking for Good by Capital One
Making something better, easier, or more accessible by SkyBet
Best use home automation or IoT devices within student accommodation by Ask4
Best use of geospatial data by Chersoft
Team most likely to change the world by epiGenesys

hackathon-location-google-maps: https://maps.google.com/?q=38 Mappin St, Sheffield S1, UK
hackathon-description-header: Third instalment of the MLH Student Hackathon at the University of Sheffield, open to students across the world.
